tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AirPollutionData (
  location_id INT,
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  pollution_level DECIMAL
)
CREATE TABLE area (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR, population INT);
CREATE TABLE pollution_level (id INT PRIMARY KEY, area_id INT, level INT, FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES area(id));
CREATE TABLE pollution_source (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR, type VARCHAR);
CREATE TABLE pollution_measurements (id INT PRIMARY KEY, date DATE, area_id INT, level INT, FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES area(id));
CREATE TABLE air_quality_standards (id INT PRIMARY KEY, pollutant VARCHAR, standard INT);
